channel.title: bash on PR
channel.description: Recent content in bash on PR

item.title: How to view git change history of a Swift method
item.description: I knew git had a feature to get change history of a method. I used it all the time with ObjC but it never worked for swift files.

item.title: Script to delete xcode buildconfigurations
item.description: Yes, you do not need this solution, unless you know for sure you have one too many build configs and it is time consuming to delete one by one.

item.title: Whatchanged - Git history as HTML Report
item.description: Recently I was requested to produce a report of changes in a git repo between two tags by testing team. I am not sure the basis of the request, as they can go through the git repo themselves.

item.title: Script to publish Hugo sites for Github
item.description: While deploying my recent hugo website to github, I re-learnt that, you can only publish gh-pages from master branch for user or organization repository.
